001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CaptureConfig;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CompositionRoot;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007/**
008 * Launches the live RADAR capture pipeline from CLI key-value arguments.
009 * <p>Utility holder for the {@link #main(String[])} entry point; not thread-safe by design because it
010 * performs process-level configuration.</p>
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class LiveCli {
015  private LiveCli() {}
016
017  /**
018   * Parses command-line arguments and runs the live processing use case.
019   *
020   * @param args CLI arguments in {@code key=value} form; {@code iface} is required and must be non-blank
021   * @throws Exception if configuration or live processing fails
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
025    Map<String, String> kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(args);
026
027    if (!kv.containsKey("iface") || kv.get("iface").isBlank()) {
028      usage();
029      return;
030    }
031
032    CaptureConfig captureConfig;
033    try {
034      captureConfig = CaptureConfig.fromMap(kv);
035    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
036      usage();
037      return;
038    }
039
040    CompositionRoot root =
041        new CompositionRoot(ca.gc.cra.radar.config.Config.defaults(), captureConfig);
042    root.liveProcessingUseCase().run();
043  }
044
045  private static void usage() {
046    System.err.println(
047        "usage: iface=<nic> [bufmb=1024 snap=65535 timeout=1 bpf='<expr>' immediate=true promisc=true]");
048  }
049}
